detail_desc: Short coat in felted fabric with draped lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud fastening. Tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a funnel collar, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
